about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a leading company in pure water delivery, serving our customers for over 15 years. We are committed to providing the highest quality standards and excellent service.

about.storyText: Our company was founded in 2010. When faced initially as a personal health issue to access fresh, clean drinking water. The company is world-class and lead.
